```esql
FROM employees
| STATS `count` = COUNT(*) WHERE languages < 3 BY languages
```

| --- | --- |
| 15 | 1 |
| 19 | 2 |
| 0 | 3 |
| 0 | 4 |
| 0 | 5 |
| 0 | null |
